startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Legs shoulder-width apart and straight. Hands besides and slightly behind the buttocks. Lean back a little, using the arms to support the back. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Slowly rotate the right foot clockwise from the ankle 5 times.
Slowly rotate the right foot anti-clockwise from the ankle 5 times.
Slowly rotate the left foot clockwise from the ankle 5 times.
Slowly rotate the left foot anti-clockwise from the ankle 5 times.
Slowly rotate both the feet clockwise from the ankle 5 times.
Slowly rotate both the feet anti-clockwise from the ankle 5 times.
Slowly rotate both the feet together in opposite direction (right foot clockwise, left foot anti-clockwise) from the ankle 5 times.
Slowly rotate both the feet together in opposite direction (right foot anti-clockwise, left foot clockwise) from the ankle 5 times.
